mapper.select:
SELECT c.id, c.is_deleted, customer_name, customer_age, customer_sex, idcard, c.room_no, building_no, checkin_date, expiration_date, contact_tel, c.bed_id, psychosomatic_state, attention, birthday, height, weight, blood_type, filepath, c.user_id, c.level_id, family_member, n.level_name, u.nickname, b.bed_no FROM customer c LEFT JOIN nurselevel n ON (c.level_id = n.id) LEFT JOIN USER u ON (c.user_id = u.id) LEFT JOIN bed b ON (c.bed_id = b.id)
and (select count(1) from customernurseitem cni where cni.customer_id=c.id and cni.is_deleted=0)=0
and (select count(1) from customernurseitem cni where cni.customer_id=c.id and cni.is_deleted=0)>0
and customer_name like concat('%', #{customerName}, '%')
and user_id =-1
and user_id =#{userId}
and c.is_deleted=0
order by c.id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer ( is_deleted, customer_name, customer_age, customer_sex, idcard, room_no, building_no, checkin_date, expiration_date, contact_tel, bed_id, psychosomatic_state, birthday, blood_type, filepath, user_id, family_member ) VALUES ( #{isDeleted}, #{customerName}, #{customerAge}, #{customerSex}, #{idcard}, #{roomNo}, #{buildingNo}, #{checkinDate}, #{expirationDate}, #{contactTel}, #{bedId}, #{psychosomaticState}, #{birthday}, #{bloodType}, #{filepath}, #{userId}, #{familyMember} )
